text: Keiko Nagatomi (born 22 November 1974) is a Japanese former professional tennis player. Nagatomi, who had a best singles ranking of 271, won four ITF titles and had her best WTA Tour performance at the 1999 Tashkent Open, where she made the second round. As a doubles player she won a further 12 ITF tournaments and featured in the qualifying draw for the 1997 Wimbledon Championships. ==ITF finals== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%; width:15%;" |- style="background:lightblue;" | $25,000 tournaments |- style="background:#f0f8ff;" | $10,000 tournaments |} ===Singles: 5 (4–1)=== {|class="sortable wikitable" style=font-size:97% |- !
